events.message: I recently bought a jacket from your store, but it doesn't fit and I want to return it and get a refund as soon as possible.
The customer's request involves returning a product and obtaining a refund due to size issues.
The refund case has been assigned to support agent Emily for handling and follow-up.
Hello, thank you for reaching out. I'm here to help you with the return and refund process for your jacket.
Could you please provide your order number and confirm the condition of the jacket for the return?
Thank you for the quick reply. My order number is 123456789, and the jacket is brand new, still with tags attached.
You can return the jacket using the prepaid shipping label we will email you shortly, and once we receive the item, we will process your full refund.
That sounds great, thank you for making this so easy. I appreciate the quick assistance!
I've sent the prepaid label to your email. Please ship the jacket back at your earliest convenience to complete the refund process.
Just checking in to confirm if you have shipped the jacket back and if everything is going smoothly with your refund.
Yes, I shipped the jacket yesterday using the label you provided. Looking forward to the refund confirmation.
We have received the returned jacket and processed your refund. You should see the amount reflected on your payment method shortly.
Please take a moment to fill out a brief survey about your refund experience to help us improve our service.
Thank you for contacting us. Your refund case is now closed. Have a great day!
